author: USA TODAY, Joel Shannon, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus is spreading so quickly that our brains can't keep up. Experts explain why.
description: Exponential growth has a technical meaning that will help you understand why the coronavirus is spreading so quickly and how its course may be altered
content:
We answer the often searched question: "What are the symptoms of coronavirus versus the flu?"
USA TODAY
The number of coronavirus deaths in the United States rose from 1 to 100 in a little more than two weeks. About a week later, the number skyrocketed to 1… [+5420 chars]
